Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 5th overall pick, by Wisconsin in 1977...
Had first career hit on 4/3/1979, off Justin Bostic (NE)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/18/1979, off Ronald Higa (Mal)...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Northeastern on 5/11/1980...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/18/1983, hitting .526 with 1 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/1983, hitting .367 with 5 HR, 21 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Lynchburg on 7/25/1987...
Signed as a free agent by Halifax on 2/16/1988 to a 4-year deal worth $3,100,000 per year...
Traded from Halifax to Ashburn on 2/19/1989 (Going to HAL: CF H. Lopez, P B. Castilla. Going to Ash: RF T. Peoples)...
Drove in 6 runs against Bay City on 5/1/1989...
Traded from Ashburn to Syracuse on 2/12/1990 (Going to SYR: RF T. Peoples. Going to Ash: CF I. Kempton, 1B M. Pagan, 2B S. Synder)...
Won World Championship with Syracuse in 1990...
Signed as a free agent by Capital City on 2/17/1992 to a 4-year deal worth $571,000 per year...
Released by Capital City on 5/12/1992...
